column5: http://www.bcrobyn.com/2013/11/york-factory-manitoba/. Found this fascinating. Good walleye fishing in the Nelson river from what I read.
That would be an amazing trip. Thanks for the share.

Wow! If you have any history buff in you at all that would be a great trip. When we fished at Nueltin Lake we got to visit the remains of the Hudson Bay Trading Post at Windy River. We planned on just taking a few minutes to walk around it but we ended up staying over an hour.
That looks like a awesome trip.
